description: The SVC_PMT_HISTORY_COMMENT table contains free text detail to explain line level history for how a payment was processed. This detail supplements the history in the SVC_PMT_HISTORY table.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: SVC_PMT_COMMENT
columns.description: Contains a comment for a line level action that was taken for the payment.
